title: Miami Heat 's revenue 2001 to 2019
summary: Overall Revenue in million U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
Revenue in million U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2011/12 to 2012/13, and finally roughly constant from 2012/13 to 2014/15.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2011/12 and 2012/13.
The highest Revenue in million U.S. dollars, of value 188.0 was reached at Year 2012/13, and 2013/14
The lowest Revenue in million U.S. dollars, of value 150.0 was reported at Year 2011/12
